jobs.title: .NET Developer
jobs.description:
.NET Developer – .NET, .NET Core, ASP.Net MVC, Entity, JavaScript, React/Vue Js, Azure, TDD, CI/CD, Agile.

THE COMPANY
.NET Developer is required for an organisation in Liverpool who are leading the way in providing data management systems for some of the country’s biggest household names such as United Utilities, Royal Mail and the NHS. They have just embarked on a real push into modern-day development and are looking for a .NET Developer to help pave the way!
 
THE ROLE
An exciting opportunity has arisen for a .NET Developer to join a growing agile development team responsible for the full development life cycle of cutting edge, greenfield projects. They will contribute to the design, development, and implementation of software, testing and writing automated tests along the way.

As the .NET Developer, a strong understanding of the .NET framework is essential. This is also a great opportunity for those without, to gain exposure to .NET Core as they look to advance their development into this. Experience with the cloud, specifically Azure, is also beneficial be it through IaaS or PaaS. It is a perfect role for those to grow their skills in some of the most popular JavaScript frameworks at the moment such as React and Vue.

.NET DEVELOPER OVERVIEW:
Full development lifecycle of greenfield solutions
Day to day use of the .NET framework (.NET Core)
Adhering to Test Driven Development methodology
 
SKILLS / EXPERIENCE REQUIRED FOR THE .NET DEVELOPER 
3+ years’ experience with the .NET framework
Prior exposure or a willingness to learn .NET Core
Knowledge of JavaScript frameworks (React and/or Vue JS)
Exposure to cloud technologies, ideally Azure
Adhere to TDD
Advocate of Agile development
 

If you are a .NET Developer with strong exposure to the .NET framework and looking to get into .NET Core please feel free to apply.

Location: Liverpool, Merseyside
Salary: Up to 50K
Type: Permanent
Key Skills: .NET Developer, NET, .NET Core, ASP.Net MVC, Entity, JavaScript, React/Vue Js, Azure, TDD, CI/CD, Agile.

jobs.title: SAP Basis Administrator
jobs.description:
SAP BASIS ADMINISTRATOR IN STUTTGART.
Location: Stuttgart, Deutschland

Type: Permanent

Salary: €75,000

 

THE COMPANY
SAP Basis Administrator is required for a market-leading global manufacturing company in Stuttgart, Deutschland. You will be joining a local team of 12 which will increase to over 30 by the end of the year, and you will be working alongside some very strong technical specialists. You will also have the opportunity to collaborate with global teams.

 

THE ROLE
The SAP Basis Administrator will be a key part of the team and support the complete lifecycle of the SAP landscapes. As the SAP Basis Administrator, you will need a good knowledge of IT systems including basis.

 

SAP BASIS ADMINISTRATOR OVERVIEW
SAP Basis Operations and projects of other SAP Basis Landscapes
You will support the complete lifecycle of the SAP landscapes
You will support migration projects from Oracle/Windows to HANA
Operation of an SAP HCM (ABAP & JAVA) desired but not essential as training can be given
 

WHAT’S ON OFFER
Up to €95,000
Flexible working environment including flexitime and the potential to work from home
Progression, training and the chance to collaborate with international teams
 

SKILLS / EXPERIENCE REQUIRED FOR THE SAP BASIS ADMINISTRATOR
Good knowledge of IT systems including Basis and preferably Windows/Oracle
Good methodology/structured way of working
Good time management skills and able to work autonomously
Fluent German and good English
 

If you’re looking for a new role and have the relevant experience, please feel free to [apply online](https://dynamicsearch.co.uk/job/sap-basis-administrator/)
 

SAP Basis Administrator – SAP, Basis, Administration, SAP Basis Administrator Jobs, SAP HCM, ABAP, Java, Oracle, Windows, Flexible Working, SAP S/4HANA, SAP ERP.

jobs.title: IT Project Manager
jobs.description:
Location: North London, Greater London (N1)

Salary: £60,000 – £70,000 per year

Type: Permanent, Full-time

 

THE COMPANY
An IT Project Manager opportunity has recently opened up for leading technology organisation with a global footprint. My client specialises in large infrastructure transformation projects across Network Services, Data Centre transformation, Professional Services and full IT Managed Services. My client partner with the leading technology vendors in their respected fields. This company pride themselves on employee development and offers a huge opportunity to progress.

 

IT PROJECT MANAGER OVERVIEW
The IT Project Manager has a real opportunity to get involved in a career-defining project, a serious CV builder! To act as a focal point to a team of 12 project managers whilst being fully accountable for the day-to-day management and delivery of key infrastructure and Technology projects with a high degree of critical business impact.

The IT Project Manager is responsible for ensuring that the project workstreams are implemented to the correct deliverables, to the required standard of quality and within the specified constraints of time and cost. In terms of project parameters, this role will manage infrastructure projects as a focal point within a global team delivering projects with high complexity. Projects will impact across a number of stakeholders, to C level and involve constrained resource teams and include significant business change/transformation.

 

SKILLS / EXPERIENCE REQUIRED FOR THE IT PROJECT MANAGER
Strong IT Project Management skills and experience
Must have Project Management experience within an IT Managed Service or Professional Service organisation
Experience with large project delivery
Experienced in delivering large scale infrastructure projects (ideally network and data centre services)
Background in Networking, Data Centre, Infrastructure Solutions
Strong Project Governance
Strong risk management and control experience RAID etc
Strong Methodical Project Manager
Strong analytical mentality and attention to detail
Board level stakeholder meetings – Experience of business change and transformation
Responsible and conscientious professional
Work from Home policy allowing a couple of days home working, a couple of days office and a couple of days client site, work permitted
Must be within a commutable distance to North London
 

If you are an IT Project Manager who wants to work for a Global leading company, with the chance to grow into a Senior Project Manager role please feel free to apply online.

jobs.title: In-House SAP Berater (CS/SD)
jobs.description:
Standort: Raum Iserlohn

Gehalt: Bis zu €85.000

Auftrag: Festanstellung

In-House SAP Berater (CS/SD) mit flexibles Arbeitsmodell und Home-Office, Iserlohn, €85.000.

Unser neuester Kunde ist mit über 5.800 Mitarbeitern weltweit eines der führenden Unternehmen in der Herstellungsindustrie,

Wir suchen an dem Headquarter in Iserlohn ab sofort einen SAP Berater (CS/SD) Inhouse.



SAP Berater Aufgaben:

Analyse betriebswirtschaftlichen Anforderungen im SAP Umfeld
Konzepterstellung und Realisierung effektiver Lösungen im Bereich SAP CS
Sehr gute Kenntnis der SAP Standard Prozesse, Beratung und Customizing in SAP CS
Begleitung von nationalen und internationalen Projekten
Betreuung der unternehmensweiten SAP CS-Systemlandschaft
Ansprechpartner für die BPO, 2nd und 3rd Level Support
Durchführung und Dokumentation von Tests und Anwenderschulungen
Eigenverantwortliche Anwendungsberatung, -unterstützung und -trainings


SAP Berater Fähigkeiten:

Abgeschlossenes (Fach-)Hochschulstudium der Wirtschaftsinformatik oder vergleichbare Qualifikation
Mindestens 3 Jahre Berufserfahrung
Teamfähigkeit und Kommunikationsstärke
Fundierte Kenntnisse im Modul SAP CS Beratung, CS Customizing und ABAP Grundkenntnisse
Idealerweise auch Erfahrung in angrenzenden Modulen SD, LE, MM
Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift


SAP berater Gehalt / Angebot

Flexibles Arbeitszeitmodell, mobiles Arbeiten
Attraktive und marktgerechte außertarifliche Vergütung sowie eine erfolgsabhängige Bonuszahlung
Individuelle Weiterentwicklung durch eines internes Weiterbildungsprogramm


Kontakt:

Haben wir Ihr Interesse geweckt? Bewerben Sie sich direkt auf unsere Webseite oder rufen Sie uns an!
Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Bewerbung!
